USB.summary: NOTE Experimental The USB interface of the WebUSB API provides attributes and methods for finding and connecting USB devices from a web page.

remarks.para: Use to get access to the USB object.

USBConnect.summary: NOTE Experimental The connect event of the interface is fired whenever a paired device is connected.

USBDisconnect.summary: NOTE Experimental The disconnect event of the interface is fired whenever a paired device is disconnected.

USBGetDevices.summary:
NOTE Experimental The getDevices method of the interface
returns a {{JSxRef("Promise")}} that resolves with an array of
objects for paired attached devices. For information on pairing devices, see
.
USBGetDevices.returns:
A {{JSxRef("Promise")}} that resolves with an array of
objects.

USBRequestDevice.summary:
NOTE Experimental The requestDevice() method of the
interface returns a that resolves with an instance of
if the specified device is found. Calling this function
triggers the user agent's pairing flow.
USBRequestDevice.returns: A {{JSxRef("Promise")}} that resolves with an instance of .
